question:
The GPS and map helped me navigate home.  I got lost when the _ got turned off. 
 (A) GPS (B) map
answer:
The GPS and map helped me navigate home. I will never get lost when the _ does not turn off. 
 (A) GPS (B) map

question:
I picked up a bag of peanuts and raisins for a snack. I wanted a sweeter snack out so I ate the _ for now. 
 (A) raisins (B) peanuts
answer:
I picked up a bag of peanuts and raisins for a snack. Although I do not want a sweeter snack out, I ate the _ for now. 
 (A) raisins (B) peanuts

question:
Once in Poland, Dennis enjoyed the trip more than Jason because _ had a shallow understanding of the Polish language. 
 (A) Dennis (B) Jason
answer:
Once in Poland, Dennis did not enjoy the trip more than Jason because _ had a deep understanding of the Polish language. 
 (A) Dennis (B) Jason

question:
The geese prefer to nest in the fields rather than the forests because in the _ predators are more hidden. 
 (A) fields (B) forests
answer:
Since in the _ predators are more hidden, the geese prefer to nest in the fields rather than the forests. 
 (A) fields (B) forests

question:
Adam put handwash only clothes in the washer but Aaron washed them by hand as _ was lazy. 
 (A) Adam (B) Aaron
answer:
As _ was lazy, Aaron washed clothes by hand but Adam put handwash only clothes in the washer.  
 (A) Adam (B) Aaron
